channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023110418
item.description:
Report X-2023110418

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: RICHMOND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING ICE CREAM. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS INSIDE. KEEP FROZEN IS HANDWRITTEN ON TWO SIDES OF THE BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 50V0E2, NIGHTINGALE ICE CREAM, INC., 8301 ALDERA LN., CHESTERFIELD VA 23838.

item.title: Report X-2023110377
item.description:
Report X-2023110377

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-06
  • City: NEWPORT NEWS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING ON THE PACKAGE CAR. DELIVERY DRIVER WAS ADVISED TO BRING BACK TO THE BUILDING FOR DMP TO PROCESS. RESPONDER DISCOVERED 2 POLY BAGS WITH 3 INDIVIDUAL BOTTLES OF ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL IN EACH. RESPONDER NOTED ONE WAS LEAKING.

item.title: Report X-2023110511
item.description:
Report X-2023110511

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: WINCHESTER
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE UNLOADING THE TRAILER ON DOOR 19 PACKAGE HANDLERS DISCOVERED AND LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED QA. THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE LEFT HAND SIDE OF THE TRAILER UNDER 1ST FLAP, NO OTHER BOXES ADJACENT TO HAZMAT. QA RESPONDED WITH PPE TO REMOVE PACKAGE AND CLEAN UP SPILLED CONTENTS. ALL PACKAGES AFFECTED WERE INSPECTED AND REPACKED. DescribePack: 1- 1 GALLON PLASTIC CONTAINER OF HERCULES SIZZLE, DRAIN AND WASTE SYSTEM CLEANER CAP CAME UNDONE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK THROUGH OUT THE BOX WET AND TORN DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WITH CONTENTS WERE PLACED INTO A HAZMAT BAG AND THEN INTO A HAZARDOUS WASTE BIN WITH LID.

item.title: Report X-2023101247
item.description:
Report X-2023101247

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: HOPEWELL
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Tank car was found with spilled material on the car by a FRA inspector. The release was found to be the result of the manway gasket being torn, cracked and missing sections. The manway gasket was replaced and the manway was secured. .
